name: Fix the Circle
description:
A calm and relaxing puzzle game made for Trijam #203. Just play as long as you like. No goal to reach, nothing to win and nothing to lose.

How to play: Use your mouse to rotate the cards. Try to rotate them so that a single closed loop is established. Some cards (the darker ones) can not be rotated. The closed loop must runs through all these fixed cards.

Enjoy the relaxing mood. I think after my rage-inducing last Trijam submission (https://mallapp.itch.io/dont-be-nervous) I owe the Trijam community this game :)
